name: E-Nexus Solutions
tagline: One Stop Solution To All Digital Products
description:
E-Nexus was launched when a couple of mobile app whiz kids met and vowed to do something that would make a difference in their lives and the lives of others. Thus, E-nexus Solutions was formed.
E-Nexus was never meant to be just another software development company that would develop software solutions according to the requirements of the clients and earn profits. The core team members of E-Nexus are eager to learn the contemporary technologies every day and create something strikingly which enables clients to launch lucrative mobile and web endeavors.
We at Enexus have gathered the most dexterous, experienced and rebellious software engineers, brand managers, creative designers, quality engineers and project managers under one roof. These team members are rebellious because they are against the conventional rigid ways of working.
Our forte is Mobile & web applications, Native iOS apps& games, Native Android apps & games.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Citibase Lonsdale House, Mailbox.52 Blucher Street.
